gpt_gen_product_description: FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA / ORGANIC WALNUT PROTEIN POWDER from Parodi Nutra SRL is a light to dark brown powder made by mechanically concentrating proteins from 100% organic Juglans Regia walnuts without chemical solvents. It offers a high protein content (35-50%) and low fat (6-13%), providing stability against oxidation and a complete amino acid profile. Ideal for enhancing bakery products like bread, pizza, and energy bars, it is certified organic, kosher, vegan, and free from pesticides, GMOs, and common allergens except nuts.
gpt_recommended_dosage_reason: No recommended dosage instructions are mentioned in the provided document for FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA / ORGANIC WALNUT PROTEIN POWDER by Parodi Nutra SRL.

Selected Vegan because the product is plant origin and suitable for vegans as stated in the self vegan statement.
gpt_claims_reason: Selected Natural & Ethically Sourced because the product is 100% organic walnuts, obtained without solvents or chemical extraction, certified organic (Reg. EU 2018/848 CCPB Srl), GMO free, pesticide free, and no animal testing performed, indicating natural and ethical sourcing.
